channel.title: I need help adding shops and with my mining script!

item.title: I need help adding shops and with my mining script!
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Use player.java to add shops, search “shopid” & use npcoption 1 or 2 depending on what npc ur using to open the interface up and load the items from player.java (assuming u r using 508)

Read full topic
item.source: I need help adding shops and with my mining script!

item.title: I need help adding shops and with my mining script!
item.dc:creator: @busta123 busta123
item.description:
@busta123 wrote:

Hey guys,

I am using this as my source:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

and when i add new items to the varrock general store and I compile and restart server none of the new items are there, even when I add a brand new shop non of the items show up it just becomes a empty shop.

Also I added ores in draynor because that is going to be my skilling area, and when you get the pick and click on any of the ores nothing happens, including clay or copper or tin I went to client.java and search the case and all the rocks have this similar code with the numbers a bit changed:

mining[0] = 4; mining[1] = 20; mining[2] = 40; mining[4] = 442; break;

I added this code to the copper:

mining[0] = 1; mining[1] = 1; if (misc.random(2) == 1) { mining[2] = 17; } else { mining[2] = 18; } mining[4] = 436; break;

and even if I click/right click to mine nothing happens! Please help with those two errors also server is supplied so you can download it and see errors for your selves thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: I need help adding shops and with my mining script!
